did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: The collection consists of two letters.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Andrew Lytle, Letters to Roysce Smith, 1962 and 1964, in the Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Accession #11203, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlotttesville, VA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: TLS 1962 Aug 17 Andrew Lytle, editor The Sewanee Review, The University of The South, Sewanee, Tennessee, to Roysce Smith, New Haven, Connecticut [Lytle thanks him for his note, expresses belief that Smith will like this issue of The Sewanee Review, and promises to relay his message to Fanny and Lon], 1 p., with envelope TLS 1964 Apr 3 Andrew Lytle, editor of The Sewanee Review, The University of The South, Sewanee, Tennessee, to Roysce [Smith] [thanks Smith for his "kind and gracious note" about his recent hospitalization and rejoices to hear he has sold fifty copies of the issue of the Review with the Mary Reynolds piece in it] 1 p.
